Function Documentation

int command_score (  int    argc,
int    last_arg,
char **    argv
) 
 

Parses score command-line and performs score.

Parameters:
argc  Number of arguments in score command-line.
last_arg  Index of last parsed argument in list.
argv  Arguments from command-line to parse.
Returns:
Returns 0 if scoring is successful; otherwise, returns -1.
Performs score command functionality.

void define_macro (  const char *    name,
const char *    value
) 
 

Parameters:
name  String value of define identifier
value  String value associated with define identifier
Stores define identifer with its value in a define node and placed in the binary search tree for quick lookup later on.

bool read_command_file (  char *    cmd_file,
char ***    arg_list,
int *    arg_num
) 
 

Parameters:
cmd_file  Name of file to read commands from.
arg_list  List of arguments found in specified command file.
arg_num  Number of arguments in arg_list array.
Returns:
Returns TRUE if read of command file was successful; otherwise, returns FALSE.

bool score_parse_args (  int    argc,
int    last_arg,
char **    argv
) 
 

Parameters:
argc  Number of arguments specified in argv parameter list.
last_arg  Index of last parsed argument in list.
argv  List of arguments to parse.
Returns:
Returns TRUE if successful in dealing with arguments; otherwise, returns FALSE.
Parses score command argument list and performs specified functions based on these arguments.

Displays usage information for score command.

Variable Documentation

unsigned long curr_malloc_size (    ) 
 

Contains the total number of bytes malloc'ed during the simulation run. This information is output to the user after simulation as a performance indicator.

unsigned long largest_malloc_size (    ) 
 

Holds the largest number of bytes in allocation at one period of time.
